title: 129: Bachelor Finale: Part 1 (Pilot Pete & BarbraGate)
itunes:title: 129: Bachelor Finale: Part 1 (Pilot Pete & BarbraGate)
description:
Broads, Part 1 of the finale has aired and we can say with all honesty, WE WERE SHOCKED! #Barbragate was about who?! Madi did what?! Peter still doesn’t know what he wants?? Well the Peter part isn’t shocking. Join us as we chat all about Hannah Ann and Madi’s meeting with the Webers, Barb and “Jim” and Jack, Peter’s need for drama, and much more! 
*The recap of Tuesday night’s episode (3/10) will be up FIRST thing Thursday morning (3/12)
INSTAGRAM:
Chatty Broads: @chattybroads 
Bekah: @bekah
Jess: @thebaddmom
THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:
